title: The role of nanotechnology in industrial water treatment
abstract: High-quality water is essential for most industrial processes, and many of these processes generate large volumes of contaminated wastewater. Nanotechnology has the potential to make industrial water treatment more efficient and less expensive, though promising technologies must be demonstrated at higher scales to make a real impact.
abstract_cn: 高质量的水对于大多数工业过程都是必不可少的，并且其中许多过程都会产生大量受污染的废水。 纳米技术有潜力使工业水处理更高效，更便宜，尽管必须大规模展示有前途的技术才能产生真正的影响。
citation_text: Jassby, D., Cath, T.Y. & Buisson, H. The role of nanotechnology in industrial water treatment. Nature Nanotech13, 670–672 (2018).
title_cn: 纳米技术在工业水处理中的作用

title: Interatomic force laws that evade dynamic measurement
abstract: Measurement of the force between two atoms is performed routinely with the atomic force microscope. The shape of this interatomic force law is now found to directly regulate this capability: rapidly varying interatomic force laws, which are common in nature, can corrupt their own measurement.
abstract_cn: 两个原子之间的力的测量通常使用原子力显微镜进行。 现在发现这种原子间力定律的形状直接调节了这种能力：自然界中快速变化的原子间力定律会破坏其自身的测量结果。
authors: ["John E. Sader", "Barry D. Hughes", "Ferdinand Huber", "Franz J. Giessibl"]
citation_text: Sader, J.E., Hughes, B.D., Huber, F. et al. Interatomic force laws that evade dynamic measurement. Nature Nanotech13, 1088–1091 (2018).
title_cn: 避免动态测量的原子间力定律
